title: Diamond Mangalsutra with Floral Pendants - Aadya Sutra
features: Delicate mangalsutra design featuring a string of traditional black beads (nalla pusalu) interspersed with shimmering 18K rose gold accents. The focal point is the series of floral pendants, each meticulously crafted and studded with sparkling round-cut diamonds. The pendants offer a modern and sophisticated twist on the classic mangalsutra design.
description: This Mangalsutra, or Nalla Pusala Danda, blends tradition with contemporary style, making it perfect for the modern woman. The exquisite diamond floral pendants add a touch of elegance and sparkle, while the classic black beads represent marital bliss and protection. Crafted with high-quality materials and meticulous attention to detail, this piece is both durable and timeless. A beautiful symbol of love and commitment.
